title: Sync tabs
content: I sync tabs with multiple devices, but I cannot get my tabs to sync with my iPad. I have tried scanning the QR code from my desktop browser. I have tried entering the password. The process never finishes on the iPad, even after the desktop browser said the process was complete.
creator: beckid75

title: Disable https entirely in Firefox
content: Since it is impossible to disable https upgrades, I will simply disable all of https in Firefox. How do I remove the https module from firefox so that it will only work with http?
creator: cmccane

title: I can't tell if I'm crazy, or if the tab area shrank
content:
I think the new update shrank the space above the tabs. When I try to find solutions, all I find are chrome users complaining about the space and ways to shrink it. However, I want that space back. It shifts my workspace, and it was one of the features I really liked from Firefox that differed from Chrome.

Or, I'm just losing my mind and having to remove the new sidebar just completely threw me off.
creator: welcomethekingofthedancefloor

title: Bookmark folders no longer showing in Firefox for android
content: I arrange my bookmarks in a folder structure by type, making it relatively simple to find the bookmark I need. This is normally in bookmarks/desktop bookmarks. But Firefox on my android 14 tablet and phone, no longer has the desktop bookmarks option. I am signed in to my account, and I have synced my account across all my devices. How do I get the desktop bookmarks option back again?
creator: MichaelMcG

title: Tab start page has massive rows
content:
